title: My
linkCopy: Get to know more about me and ways I can help you

items.title: Optimization
items.copy: I optimize websites to get better rankings by decreasing their loading times and incorporating in site SEO best practices.

items.title: The Whole Package
items.copy: I can design the UI, develop the frontend and backend of a WordPress website. I have experience working with the most popular plugins.

items.title: I understand the Business
items.copy: I have been involved in the whole process of creating a website: from conception, planning and development; to deployment,maintenance, optimization and improving features.

items.title: Team Player
items.copy: I was a WordPress Team Leader assisting junior developers and have worked in-house and remotely, in small and large projects with several companies.
